item.title: Banking & Finance
item.description: The most promising data & AI cases in Banking For banks, ensuring the adoption of AI technologies across the enterprise is no longer a choice, but a strategic imperative. Envisioning and building the bankâ€™s AI capabilities is critical to succeed in an increasingly competitive marketplace. The value generation potential by AI for banks is estimated to be USD 1 trillion globally per annum. The largest part of this value is to be found within the Marketing & Sales (e.
